meanings.sent1: The thulia in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted a thulia in my backyard last spring.
meanings.sent3: The thulia in the flower bed seemed to be dancing in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and colorful as a thulia in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the thulia filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of a silicate of aluminum and fluorine.
meanings.sent1: The thulia mineral was found deep underground.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered a vein of thulia in the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The jeweler crafted a stunning necklace using thulia as the centerpiece.
meanings.sent4: The thulia sparkled like a precious gem in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The rare thulia mineral was highly sought after by collectors.
